SRP.Q: On the Sentiment score (-1 to 1) dimension, what is the spatial relationship of Chirper relative to ClipVibe in terms of vertical (above/below) direction?
SRP.A: {Chirper} is {below} {ClipVibe} on the Sentiment score (-1 to 1) dimension.

SRP.Q: Which dimension is the first position to the left of dimension Sentiment score (-1 to 1)?
SRP.A: The first position to the left of Sentiment score (-1 to 1) is {Click-through rate (%)}.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Virality coefficient (shares/view)} axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Click-through rate (%)} axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart.
